fields.title: Raiders of the Lost Tomb
fields.description: Inspired by the movies, teams solve clues, puzzles, and challenges to discover hidden treasures. Includes activities such as Spiders Web, Water Transfer, Art Works, Giant Puzzles, and Cryptic Clues.

fields.title: Corporate Fun Day
fields.description: A versatile event with icebreakers, games like marble run, cross the river, spider web, volleyball, and optional celebratory meal.

fields.title: Amazing Race
fields.description: Teams race against the clock to complete creative challenges at checkpoints across the venue.

fields.title: Minute to Win It
fields.description: Fast-paced, 60-second challenges that test skills and cooperation. Hilarious and memorable.

fields.title: Trust Outcome Based
fields.description: Activities designed to build trust and openness. Includes Blindfold Walk, Trust Lean, and more.

fields.title: Goal Setting Outcome Based
fields.description: Focuses on shared vision, mission, and strategy with fun team challenges.

fields.title: The Artist in You and Your Team
fields.description: Every team member paints part of a larger artwork—revealed at the end for a powerful visual metaphor.

fields.title: Boeresport & Indigenous Games
fields.description: A variety of traditional South African games—sack racing, tug-of-war, stick fighting, and more.

fields.title: Mini Olympics
fields.description: Relay races, soccer, archery, volleyball, and more—an Olympic-style team competition.

fields.title: Quiz Master
fields.description: General knowledge and pop-culture quiz competition. Builds friendly rivalry and trust.

fields.title: Movie Making
fields.description: Teams act, direct, and edit their own short movies. Creativity, teamwork, and planning are key.

fields.title: Murder Mystery
fields.description: Solve a themed murder mystery. Over 40 plots available. Encourages deduction and creative thinking.

fields.title: Battle of the Bands
fields.description: Teams create musical instruments and perform. Inspires creativity and laughter.

fields.title: Cardboard Boat Build
fields.description: Teams build and race cardboard boats. A test of quick thinking and communication.

fields.title: Pick 6
fields.description: Teams pick 6 activities from a large menu—physical and mental challenges tailored to your group.

fields.title: Hitting the Target
fields.description: Penalty shootout, catty, blindfolded darts, and other fun target games.

fields.title: Escape Room
fields.description: A classic escape room with puzzles, locks, and codes. Teams must work together under pressure.

fields.title: Wheelchair Build (Charity)
fields.description: Assemble and donate wheelchairs to those in need. A meaningful and rewarding team event.

fields.title: Bike Building (Charity)
fields.description: Teams build and donate bicycles for charity. Includes a fun race to test the bikes.

fields.title: Potjie Cooking
fields.description: Teams compete to cook the best potjie. Ingredients are earned through team activities.

fields.title: Box Cart Building & Racing
fields.description: Teams design, build, and race box carts. Requires engineering, creativity, and teamwork.

fields.title: Drumming
fields.description: Collaborative group drumming for unity, energy, and fun.

fields.title: Boomwhackers
fields.description: Create music together using colorful tubes. Unites teams in rhythm.

fields.title: Gumboot Dancing
fields.description: Fun, high-energy gumboot dancing led by expert facilitators.

fields.title: Archery
fields.description: Test precision and focus in a group archery session.

fields.title: Spud & Spoon Race
fields.description: Fast, fun team race—balance your potato on a spoon and cheer your team on!

fields.title: Egg & Spoon Race
fields.description: Classic egg-and-spoon relay for quick team bonding.

fields.title: Tug of War
fields.description: Teams face off in a test of strength and coordination.

fields.title: Blindfold Challenge
fields.description: Navigate a course or complete a challenge—while blindfolded. Builds trust and communication.

fields.title: Trust Lean
fields.description: A trust-building exercise to kick off any program.

fields.title: Virtual Escape Room
fields.description: A digital escape room—teamwork and creative thinking required!

fields.title: Virtual Quiz
fields.description: Remote team quiz game to engage and connect your distributed team.

fields.title: Virtual Drumming
fields.description: Live virtual drumming session led by a professional facilitator.

fields.title: Virtual Amazing Race
fields.description: An online twist on the classic Amazing Race—perfect for remote teams.

fields.title: Laughter Games
fields.description: A set of fun, fast-paced games designed to bring laughter and energy.

fields.title: Sports Day
fields.description: Teams compete in a mix of athletic events—fun and fitness for everyone.

fields.title: Indoor Olympics
fields.description: A variety of indoor team games—perfect for winter or rainy days.

fields.title: MasterChef Challenge
fields.description: Teams compete to cook the best meal. Ingredients are won in team challenges.

fields.title: The Great Egg Drop
fields.description: Build a contraption to keep your egg safe in a high drop. Creative fun!

fields.title: Marble Run
fields.description: Teams race marbles through a course they design—speed and planning required.

fields.title: TBAE Olympics
fields.description: A tailored Olympic-style games event with unique TBAE challenges.
